name: Best Friends for Never Quiz for Experts | Harrison, Lisi

questions.text: Whose birthday was the Lyons family and the Block family celebrating?
questions.explanation:
William Block.

	There were forty candles on the cake.

questions.text: Who did Massie get to plan the boy/girl Halloween party?
questions.explanation:
Landon Dorsey.

	Landon Dorsey is a professional party planner.

Kristen and Dylan.

	Kristen told Alicia she likes Derrington.  Dylan told Massie that she likes Derrington.

Olivia.

	Olivia had a nose job.

questions.text: Who was the boy that Massie found for Claire during the boy/girl Halloween party?
questions.explanation:
Tristan.

	Tristan borrowed his sister's makeup.

Cam.

	Cam is always giving Todd CDs and candy to give to her.

questions.text: What did Massie and her friends decide to be for Halloween?
questions.explanation:
dirty devils.

	Claire went as Blossom from "The Powerpuff Girls".

questions.text: When did Claire call off the bet with Massie?
questions.correct: after Massie said she would work with her on the uniforms
options: there was a bet, but it was between Claire and Layne
questions.explanation:
after Massie said she would work with her on the uniforms.

	The bet was the Massie couldn't shop for a month, and Claire couldn't wear the same outfit twice for a month.

questions.text: Claire never got to be friends with Massie.
questions.explanation:
false.

	Claire got to be friends with Massie during the dinner with their families.
